articles.description: Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) chairman Ehsan Mani on Sunday confirmed that the Asia Cup slated to be held in June this year is likely to be postponed if India reach the World Test Championship final.
articles.title: Asia Cup To Be Postponed If India Reach World Test Championship Final: PCB Chairman Ehsan Mani - NDTVSports.com
